SEARCH
Package com.pds.curiousmind.model.strategy.provider

Enum Class StrategyProvider

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<StrategyProvider>
com.pds.curiousmind.model.strategy.provider.StrategyProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<StrategyProvider>, Constable
public enum StrategyProvider extends Enum<StrategyProvider>
Provides dynamic discovery and instantiation of available Strategy implementations for question ordering and processing.

The StrategyProvider is a singleton enum that scans the com.pds.curiousmind.model.strategy.implementation package for all classes implementing the Strategy interface. It supports both enum singletons and regular class implementations. Discovered strategies are mapped by their StrategyType for fast retrieval.

Key Features:

  • Uses reflection to discover all Strategy implementations at runtime.
  • Handles both enum singletons (with an INSTANCE field) and regular classes.
  • Maps each strategy to its StrategyType for easy lookup.
  • Logs errors using Logger if instantiation fails.
  • Provides a single access point for retrieving strategies by type.

Usage Example:

     StrategyProvider provider = StrategyProvider.INSTANCE;
     Strategy strategy = provider.getStrategy(StrategyType.SEQUENTIAL);
     List<Question> questions = strategy.getProcessedQuestions(block);
Since:
1.0
